channel.title: Capacitacoes on Insper Data
channel.description: Recent content in Capacitacoes on Insper Data

item.title: Aula 1 - ggplot
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, error = FALSE) # install.packages('tidyverse') # install.packages('gapminder') # install.packages('ggthemes') library(gapminder) library(tidyverse) library(ggthemes) gap <- filter(gapminder, year == 1997) ggplot(data = gap) + geom_point(mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) ggplot(data = gap) + geom_point(mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) ggplot(data = gap) + geom_point(mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent, size = pop)) + scale_x_log10() ggplot(data = gap) + geom_text(mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent, size = pop, label = country)) + scale_x_log10() ggplot(data = gap) + geom_text(mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent, size = pop, label = country)) + scale_x_log10() ggplot(data = gap, mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) + geom_point(mapping = aes(color = continent, size = pop)) + scale_x_log10() + geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = lm, mapping = aes(color = continent)) ggplot(data = gap, mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) + geom_point(mapping = aes(color = continent, size = pop)) + scale_x_log10() + geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = lm, mapping = aes(group = continent), color = "black") ggplot(data = gap, mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) + geom_point(mapping = aes(color = continent, size = pop)) + scale_x_log10() + geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = lm, mapping = aes(color = continent)) + facet_wrap(vars(continent), scales = "free") ggplot(data = gap, mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) + geom_point(mapping = aes(color = continent, size = pop)) + scale_x_log10() + geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = lm, mapping = aes(group = continent), color = "black") + theme_bw() ggplot(data = gap, mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) + geom_point(mapping = aes(color = continent, size = pop)) + scale_x_log10() + geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = lm, mapping = aes(color = continent)) + facet_wrap(vars(continent), scales = "free") + theme_stata()

item.title: Aula2
item.description: Expressões Regulares Resumo: Coringa: . Âncoras: ^ $ Especiais: Grupos: [abc] [^abc] Alternativas: (ba|ca) Quantificadores: ?, +, *, {n,m}, {n,m}? (lazy matching) Agrupamentos: ( ) Backreference: (..)\\1 Puxando o Tidyverse library(tidyverse) ## Warning: package 'tidyverse' was built under R version 4.0.3 ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.2 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.0.4 v dplyr 1.0.2 ## v tidyr 1.
